All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddTariffCommand
AddTariffCommand is a class that implements the Command interface.
AdminMenuCommand
AdminMenuCommand is a Command class that handles displaying a list of subscribers to an administrator.
AppContext
The class `AppContext` is a singleton utility class that provides access to instances of the TariffService, UserService, and TransactionService classes.
AppErrorHandler
The AppErrorHandler class is a servlet that handles errors in the application.
AuthenticationFilter
The AuthenticationFilter class is a servlet filter that checks user's authorization for accessing certain commands and pages.
ChangeLanguageCommand
ChangeLanguageCommand is a Command implementation class.
ChangePasswordCommand
The ChangePasswordCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to change a subscriber's password.
ChangeUserBalanceCommand
The ChangeUserBalanceCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to change the balance of a user.
ChangeUserStatusCommand
The class ChangeUserStatusCommand implements the Command interface.
Command
The Command interface is implemented by any class whose instances are intended to represent a command to be executed in the context of a HTTP request and response.
CommandFactory
The CommandFactory class is a singleton enum that serves as a factory for creating different commands for different user roles based on the command name.
CommandNames
The CommandNames class is a final class that contains the string constant names of various commands.
CommandNotFoundException
A controller exception that should be thrown if the required command is not found.
ConnectionPool
Enum representing the connection pool for accessing MariaDB data source.
ConnectTariffCommand
ConnectTariffCommand is a class that implements the Command interface.
ContextInitListener
ContextInitListener is a ServletContextListener class that is responsible for initializing the database and services when the application is started.
DailyWithdrawCommand
The DailyWithdrawCommand implements the Runnable interface to run a daily withdrawal process.
DAO<T>
The DAO interface defines the standard operations that a Data Access Object (DAO) should contain.
DAODeleteException
The DAO exception to be thrown if an attempt to delete a record from the persistence layer fails.
DAOException
Super class for all DAO exceptions.
DAOFactory
Interface DAOFactory that implements factory methods for creating DAO objects.
DAOFactoryMariaDB
The DAOFactoryMariaDB is an implementation of the DAOFactory interface for MariaDB.
DAOInsertException
The DAO exception to be thrown if an attempt to insert a record to the persistence layer fails.
DAOMappingException
The DAO exception to be thrown if an attempt to map a record with entity failed.
DAOReadException
The DAO exception to be thrown if an attempt to read a record from the persistence layer fails.
DAORecordAlreadyExistsException
The DAO exception to be thrown if record to be inserted already exists.
DAOUpdateException
The DAO exception to be thrown if an attempt to update a record in the persistence layer fails.
DateFormatTag
The DateFormatTag class is a custom tag class in JavaServer Pages (JSP) technology that formats a date to be displayed in either English or Ukrainian locale.
DisableTariffCommand
The class is responsible for disabling the selected tariff for a subscriber.
DownloadTariffsCommand
Class DownloadTariffsCommand generates a PDF document that contains a list of tariffs for a selected service.
EditTariffCommand
Class representing the implementation of the EditTariffCommand.
EmailUtil
Enum class that provides methods for sending emails in a single threaded Executor.
EncodingFilter
EncodingFilter class is used to set the character encoding of the request and response.
FrontController
FrontController is a servlet that acts as a front controller for the application.
LocaleSetFilter
The LocaleSetFilter class is a Servlet filter that sets the locale based on the 'lang' cookie.
LogAccessFilter
LogAccessFilter is a servlet filter that logs the access of a user.
LoginCommand
The LoginCommand class implements the Command interface and is used for user authentication in the system.
LogoutCommand
The LogoutCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to logout from the system.
MariaDBConstants
Class which contains various constants used in a database application.
NegativeUserBalanceException
A Service exception that will be thrown if an attempt to change a user's balance results in a negative user balance.
NoTransactionsFoundException
A service exception that will be thrown if an attempt to retrieve a user transaction results in an empty collection.
OpenAddTariffCommand
This class provides the implementation of the Command interface.
OpenUserRegistrationCommand
This class provides the implementation of the Command interface.
Page
The Page class contains constant strings representing the various pages in the application.
PasswordNotMatchException
The service exception that will be thrown if a password change attempt was made with an incorrect current password.
PasswordUtil
The PasswordUtil class provides utility methods for password management.
QueryBuilder
The QueryBuilder class is used to construct and execute SQL queries.
RegisterUserCommand
RegisterUserCommand is a concrete implementation of the Command interface that is responsible for handling user registration request.
RemoveTariffCommand
The RemoveTariffCommand class implements the Command interface and removes a tariff.
RemoveUserCommand
The class implements the Command interface.
ReplenishCommand
The ReplenishCommand class implements Command interface and represents a command to replenish a user's account.
ResetPasswordCommand
The ResetPasswordCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to reset password for the specified email.
Role
Role entity class.
Role
Role enum.
RoleDAO
Role DAO interface.
RoleDAOMariaDB
Role DAO implementation for MariaDB.
SchedulerInitListner
The `SchedulerInitListner` class is a Servlet context listener that initializes a scheduler and schedules a `DailyWithdrawCommand` to run at a fixed rate.
Service
Service entity class.
Service
Service enum.
ServiceDAO
Service DAO interface.
ServiceDAOMariaDB
Service DAO implementation for MariaDB.
SortingOrder
Enum that represents sorting order of elements.
Tariff
Tariff entity class.
TariffDAO
Tariff DAO interface.
TariffDAOMariaDB
Tariff DAO implementation for MariaDB.
TariffDTO
TariffDTO class.
TariffForm
TariffForm class.
TariffService
The TariffService interface provides methods for interacting with the DAO and performing business logic related to tariffs.
TariffServiceException
The general Tariff service exception.
TariffServiceImpl
Tariff Service implementation.
Transaction
Transaction entity class.
TransactionDAO
A DAO interface for transactions.
TransactionDAOMariaDB
Transaction DAO implementation for MariaDB.
TransactionDTO
TransactionDTO class.
TransactionService
Interface for the Transaction Service.
TransactionServiceException
The general Transaction service exception.
TransactionServiceImpl
Transaction Service implementation with DAOFactory.
User
User entity class.
UserAlreadyExistException
A service exception that will be thrown when trying to add an existing user.
UserAlreadyHasTariffException
A service exception that will be thrown when trying to add an existing tariff to user.
UserDAO
DAO interface for managing User entities.
UserDAOMariaDB
User DAO implementation for MariaDB.
UserDTO
UserDTO class.
UserForm
UserForm class.
UserNotFoundException
A service exception that will be thrown when trying to get not existing user.
UserService
UserService interface contains methods to interact with user data and perform business logic.
UserServiceException
The general User service exception.
UserServiceImpl
User Service implementation.
ValidationErrorException
A service exception that will be thrown when validation failed.
Validator
The Validator class provides methods for validating UserForm, TariffForm and password input and creating error messages informing about failed validations.
ViewAccountCommand
The ViewAccountCommand class implements the Command interface.
ViewActiveTariffsCommand
Class ViewActiveTariffsCommand implements Command interface and is responsible for loading tariffs for the currently logged user and providing the view for active tariffs.
ViewProfileCommand
ViewProfileCommand is a command class that implements the Command interface.
ViewSubscriberAccountCommand
Class ViewSubscriberAccountCommand handles the view account request for a subscriber.
ViewSubscriberProfileCommand
ViewSubscriberProfileCommand is a concrete implementation of Command interface.
ViewSubscriberTariffsCommand
The ViewSubscriberTariffsCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to retrieve the list of tariffs that a particular subscriber with the days left until their next payment.
ViewTariffsCommand
The ViewTariffsCommand class implements the Command interface and represents the implementation of the view tariffs command.
